directions: Cut cheese into matchsticks and put in a large bowl. Peel celery root and apples and cut into matchsticks. Add celery root, apples, and lemon juice to cheese, tossing gently.

In a small bowl stir together remaining ingredients and add to slaw, tossing gently. Slaw may be made 1 day ahead and chilled, covered. Add additional horseradish to taste before serving if necessary. Season slaw with salt and pepper.
ingredients: about 3 tablespoons bottled horseradish, drained, or grated fresh horseradish to taste
title: Celery Root, Gruyère, and Apple Slaw with Horseradish
